DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose evaluation life quality Fibromyalgia patient . The investigator ' main hypothesis include role geographical , sociological , psychological physical activity life quality .
DOC.brief_title: Life Quality Determinant Assessment Fibromyalgia Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Age group : 20 60 Male female American College Rheumatology criterion Social Security beneficiary Informed consent patient Patient inform medical examination prior inclusion Patient reside BasRhin area No medical objection perform stress test Any cardiorespiratory musculoskeletal affection prevent physical activity Any particular clinical form disease Patient situation exclusion Subject incapacity understand inform consent Patient deprive freedom protection conservator Pregnancy breastfeeding
